variants.description: Familial parkin missense mutations that enhance p53 expression in AR-JP brains

functional_evidence.step_1: Pathogenic variant (enhances p53 expression, which is detrimental)
functional_evidence.step_2: No variant controls used in the study
functional_evidence.step_4: Statistical analysis not provided, but functional effect is clear

variants.description: Familial parkin deletion mutations that enhance p53 expression in AR-JP brains

functional_evidence.step_1: Pathogenic variant (enhances p53 expression, which is detrimental)
functional_evidence.step_2: No variant controls used in the study
functional_evidence.step_4: Statistical analysis not provided, but functional effect is clear
